sentences.english: Plastic plates and cups also make up 0.5 percent of our trash every year (PDF), and those products induce plenty of environmental agita.
sentences.chinese: 每年废弃的胶杯和胶碟也在垃圾中占据0。

sentences.english: When greasy, dirty rags are used to wipe the tables.
sentences.chinese: 餐台下有油脂或脏的胶贴。

sentences.english: The compound formulation for calendered belt of steel- belted radial tire was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 试验研究半钢子午线轮胎压延法带束层胶配方。

sentences.english: Check with your school about whether it has a sealant program.
sentences.chinese: 核实你的学校是否有提供保护胶的计划。

sentences.english: Gradient gel electrophoresis determine small, dense low-density lipoprotein in plasma of patients with coronary heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 梯度胶电泳法测定冠心病患者血浆小密低密度脂蛋白。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the utility of EC glue in neurosurgical operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨EC胶在神经外科各类手术中的应用。

sentences.english: They have been secured with a pin place through the foot and ankle and epoxied in place.
sentences.chinese: 他们已经用针穿过足部和脚踝，然后用环氧胶固定了。

sentences.english: Magnesium aluminum hydroxides show higher adsorption capacity to the model pitch and stickies at neutral pH.
sentences.chinese: 氢氧化镁铝对树脂和胶黏物在中性条件下吸附量较大。

sentences.english: Let's stick them together with glue.
sentences.chinese: 咱们把它们胶在一起吧。

sentences.english: Food gum's application in ham was studied.
sentences.chinese: 探讨食用胶在西式火腿中的应用。

sentences.english: A gel might work better for areas covered with hair, such as the scalp.
sentences.chinese: 胶类产品更适合同于有毛发的地方，如头皮处。

sentences.english: The binder system about cationic guar gum is most active field of research.
sentences.chinese: 阳离子瓜尔胶的新式捆绑系统是研究的热点。

sentences.english: Genetic Parameter Estimation and Analysis on Improvement Effect of High-Yielding Guttapercha Clones Associate with Eucommia ulmoides Oliv.

sentences.english: For smaller components, use of a material with a lower yield point is best.
sentences.chinese: 而对于小型元件，则采用低屈服点贴片胶最为适宜。

sentences.english: Mastic is the recommended adhesive for gluing indoor mosaic tiles.
sentences.chinese: 乳香是室内马赛克瓷砖粘合胶建议。

sentences.english: He gummed the back of stamps.
sentences.chinese: 他在邮票的背面涂上胶。
